feature.label: Matrix4.plot
feature.description: Build DotPlots from textfiles and sourcecodes even from PDFs! Use the Plot to recognize simularity, copy&paste and duplicated code. Usage of the Matrix4.plot is very easy but also provides customized plotting to more advanced users.
feature.copyright: This plugin is copyright by the Matrix4.plot team at the University of Applied Sciences Giessen-Friedberg, Giessen, Germany.
